Package game

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ammo
    Manages collectible ammo crates
    Attack
    Manages attack mechanisms for enemies besides collisions
    Avatar
    Creates and contains all fields for the playable character
    BonusLife
    Manages collectible bonus lives
    Damage
    Manages damage for the playable character and enemies
    Doorway
    Doorway of type sensor to transport between levels
    Enemy
    Creates Enemy npcs with different attributes and different behaviour
    FlipCharacter
    Makes all character's images correspond to the direction of which they are looking and aids some enemy movement attributes
    Game
    Main Game class which initialises levels and stores key aspects towards loading new levels and levels from game files
    GameLevel
    Main level class, populates level with the floor and outer walls and creates abstract functions
    GameLoader
    Loads game state from a text file
    GameSaver
    Saves game state to file such as level, player position
    Level1
    Creates Level 1 and places all features into the world
    Level2
    Creates Level 2 and places all features into the world
    Level3
    Creates Level 3 and places all features into the world
    Level4  
    Menu
    Creates an option menu with buttons for resuming, restarting, saving, loading and quiting the Game
    MenuButton
    Key listener for when the user presses ESC key a menu opens
    MovementController
    Controls playable characters movement by keys pressed
    MyView
    View of the world with painted back ground set by the levels and fore ground showing how many lives the player has left and how much ammo they have
    Projectile
    Creates a dynamic body with a gravity scale of 0 and a given speed/ velocity
    Shoot
    Manages the shooting mechanism for both npcs and for the playable character
